author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Henan Shuanghui Investment & Development to pay 2017 dividend on April 27
text:
April 20(Reuters) - Henan Shuanghui Investment & Development Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 11 yuan per 10 shares (before tax) for 2017, to shareholders of record on April 26
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 27 and the dividend will be paid on April 27
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/iPrWma
